summary: The Department of Veterans Affairs is seeking to reduce the time veterans wait for decisions on disability claim appeals, which average 3 years for initial appeals. Five new appeals options are scheduled to become available in February. In our prior work, we made recommendations on how VA could better plan these reforms. This testimony is an update on VA's progress. The agency is acting on...
title: VA Disability Benefits: Planning Gaps Could Impede Readiness for Successful Appeals Implementation
